issue.title: williamsburggarment.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://williamsburggarment.com/hemming-jeans-chain-stitch-service/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwilliamsburggarment.com%2Fhemming-jeans-chain-stitch-service%2F) ### Comment > Verify you are human by completing the action below for CloudFlare does not accept I'm human when I check the box unless AdGuard is turned off. Please help. Thanks. This also happened with Huchberry's site earlier today, so the issue is with CloudFlare hosted sites. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fjo741mlvhckg008c4oo888g8g80gko8o68leamdg0.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/oaqezxesro08c8oockks0ck00oow0soj8sr8luot5c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.14.1.1603 release System version: | macOS Sonoma 14.4.1 Browser: | Firefox Stealth mode options: | Block WebRTC,
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://rezka.ag/series/documentary/35236-posledniy-agent-ubn-2020.html#t:232-s:1-e:1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frezka.ag%2Fseries%2Fdocumentary%2F35236-posledniy-agent-ubn-2020.html%23t%3A232-s%3A1-e%3A1) ### Comment > При включенном адгуард не запускается видео и сайт пишет что есть проблемы с интернетом. > > Зайти на сайт > Нажать кнопку play > Видео не запускается ### Screenshots

issue.title: niitruda.com
